description: Wrap old plugins to support streams.
name: gulp-streamify

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- tests/*.mocha.js -R spec -t 5000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.trinita: npm-check-updates -u && npm test && git commit package.json -m "Dependencies update" && git push
